Question.Subject: Any good site to download free audiobooks?
Question.Content: I don't care about the quality of the reading or anything. I just would like to be able to download some books online that i can listen to in the car or while im out of town. I have found some of my books online but i have had no luck with others.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
http://www.audiobookvault.ws/
I've found some great stuff on this site. Stuff i'd never normally listen to. I really enjoyed "World War Z" recently. It soudns a bit rubbish but is so well written and read by good actors.
He sometimes keeps moving, so its a good idea to subscribe to his RSS feed (Using google reader or something). Its also a lot, lot easier to browse what hes got posted up.

Answer.Content:
